title: # 416 - Mark Normand & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with Mark Normand. We talk about Mark releasing his own special on Youtube, touring Europe together, favorite drinking stories, quarantine in NY, and much more! 

 

Check out Mark’s brand new stand up special “Out to Lunch” for free here on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tDolNU89SXI 

 

You can Venmo Mark Normand at @Mark-Normand 

 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
